text: Under an inert atmosphere the Mg(BHT)2(THF)2 catalyst 1 was dissolved in anhydrous degassed toluene ( 425 mL ) and anhydrous degassed propylene oxide ( 105 mL , 1.50 mol ) was added . Anhydrous , degassed propargyl alcohol initiator ( 8.66 mL , 0.15 mol ) was added , followed by the addition of powdered maleic anhydride ( 147.0 g , 1.50 mol ) . The reaction was heated to 80 ° C to begin the polymerization , and aliquots were removed to check conversion of the maleic anhydride . Upon full conversion ( ca . 45 h ) , the polymerization was cooled and quenched by the addition of 3 mL of CHCl3 . The polymer was precipitated into cold hexanes and dried to afford a yellow - orange viscous liquid . 1H NMR : ( 500 MHz , CDCl3 ) , δ ( ppm ) : 6.34 - 6.24 ( m , 20H , OC(=O)-CH = CH - C(=O)O ) , 5.32 - 5.22 ( s , br , 10H CH2-CH(CH3)-O ) , 4.78 ( s , HC≡C - CH2-O ) , 4.35 - 4.24 ( m , 20H , CH2CH(CH3)O ) , 2.54 ( s , 1H , HC≡C - CH2-O ) , 1.35 - 1.32 ( d , 30H , CH3 ) . 13C NMR : ( 125 MHz , CDCl3 ) , δ ( PPM ) : 166.7 ( C = O ) , 131.6 ( OC(=O)-CH = CH - C(=O)O ) , 75.8 ( HC C - CH2 ) , 70.1 ( CH2CH(CH3)O ) , 69.1 ( CH2CH(CH3)O ) , 51.1 ( HC C - CH2 ) , 16.2 ( CH3 ) .

In an Etelux glovebox , the appropriate amount of carboxylate ( 0.01 mmol , 1 equiv . ) , cyclic anhydride ( 0.1 mmol , 100 equiv . ) were added in an oven - dried tube equipped with a magnetic stir , followed by epoxide ( 0.5 mmol , 500 equiv . ) . The tube was removed from the glovebox and placed in an aluminum heating block ( 110 oC ) for 1.5 h. The reaction mixture was diluted with approximately 10 mL dichloromethane and dropwise precipitated into 100 mL of methanol by hydrochloric acid with vigorous stirring , then the methanol were filtrated or poured out . The resulting polymers were dried under vacuum at 40 ºC.

Into a 10 mL dried Schlenk tube equipped with magnetic stirrer was placed with polymer ( 59.7 mg , 0.1 mmol ) , diethylamine ( 36.6 mg , 0.5 mmol ) . Dried DMF ( 1 mL ) were injected into the tube by a syringe . The resulting mixture was stirred at 50 oC in air for 24 h. After cooled to room temperature , 4 mL of DCM was added to dilute the mixture . Then the solution was added dropwise into 200 mL of methanol via a cotton filter under stirring . The precipitate was allowed to stand overnight and then collected by filtration . The polymer was washed with methanol and dried under vacuum at room temperature to a constant weight . A dark yellow solid was obtained in 90 % yield . Mw = 19 800 , Mw / Mn = 1.84 . 1H NMR ( 500 MHz , CD2Cl2 ) , δ ( TMS , ppm ) : 7.59–6.56 , 5.40 , 3.91 , 3.40–3.11 , 1.89–1.63 , 1.57–0.96 . 13C NMR ( 125 MHz , CD2Cl2 ) , δ ( TMS , ppm ) : 207.87 , 159.65 , 154.82 , 141.15 , 138.59 , 129.63 , 129.22 , 121.51 , 115.68 , 113.10 , 83.88 , 68.19 , 56.96 , 42.26 , 42.09 , 29.70 , 26.31 , 25.18 , 25.00 , 14.55 , 13.79 .

The palladium catalyst ( 1.27 × 10−5 mol ) and 1,4-benzoquinone ( [ BQ]/[Pd ] = 5 ) were dissolved in dichloromethane and then added to the flask . After the establishment of the reaction temperature ( 15 ° C ) , the system was continuously stirred for 5 min and then vinyl arene comonomer ( [ vinyl arene]/[Pd ] = 6800 ) was injected by a syringe into the well - stirred solution . The reaction temperature of 15 ° C was controlled with a cooler in polymerization experiments . The polymerization proceeded for 24 h at 1 atm CO ( absolute pressure ) . The resulting polymer was precipitated with acidic methanol ( 95:5 methanol / HCl ) and washed with methanol . To remove metallic palladium , the polymer was dissolved in chloroform , filtered through Celite , and precipitated with methanol . The solid was washed thoroughly with methanol and dried under vacuum to a constant weight .

αMeSt ( 0.178 mmol ) in THF ( 2.46 mL ) was added to secBuLi ( 0.0740 mmol ) in n - heptane ( 1.98 mL ) at −78 ° C and reacted for 15 min . To a red solution of oligo(α - methylstyryl)lithium , PhOC ( 0.681 mmol ) in THF ( 15.1 mL ) was added and allowed at −78 ° C for 10 min . Then , a THF solution ( 7.47 mL ) of 1 ( 0.567 g , 4.10 mmol ) was added to the red suspension at −78 ° C and reacted for 30 min . The polymerization was terminated with degassed methanol and the red coloration immediately disappeared on the addition of methanol indicating the presence of the poly(1 ) anion . The polymer was precipitated by pouring the mixture into a large amount of methanol and isolated by the filtration . The resulting polymer ( 0.56 g ) was further purified by freeze - drying from benzene and characterized by 1H and 13C NMR , SEC , TGA , DSC , and MALDITOF - MS measurements .

In a 100 mL two - necked flask , naphthalenediamide monomer ( 200 mg , 0.67 mmol ) was charged and dissolved in toluene ( 5.8 mL ) . To this solution , MMAO ( 1.8 M in toluene , 2.2 mL ) and BHT ( 0.30 M in toluene , 1.0 mL ) were added in this direction . Then , N2 in the headspace of the flask was evacuated under vacuum and propylene was backfilled at room temperature until saturation . Zirconium complex ( 16.7 mg , 20 μmol ) in toluene ( 1.0 mL ) was added to start the polymerization under the flow of propylene . After 30 min , the reaction mixture was poured into 200 mL of MeOH containing 4 mL of concentrated HCl to precipitate the polymer . The polymer was collected by filtration , washed with water and methanol , and dried for 6 h under vacuum at 60 ° C . 229 mg of functional polypropylene was obtained as a colorless solid .

1-phenyl-1,3-butadiene ( 5.0 g , 0.0384 mol ) in 45.0 mL of benzene was initiated by injecting 3.84 mL of secBuLi at room temperature and then the reaction was taken to water - bath at 50 oC. After 24 h , the reaction was quenched by adding MeOH ( 1.50 mL ) , isolating the filtrate and then dried under vacuum overnight , the obtained product as white powder .

0.3 g poly(1-phenyl-1,3-butadiene ) ( dissolved in 400 mL of cyclohexane ) was added into the reactor , then 2.0 mL nickel naphthenate ( 0.4356 M ) and 6.0 mL triisobutylaluminium ( 0.3184 M ) was added into the reactor . The parameters setting of the hydrogenation reactor is as following : hydrogen pressure – 3 Mpa , 900r / min , reaction temperature–60 oC. After 1 h , the reaction was terminated and the products were precipitated with sufficient methanol and subsequently dissolved in an appropriate amount of THF and this process was repeating twice , isolating the filtrate and then dried under vacuum overnight , all the obtained hydrogenation products as white powder .

CF3SO3H ( 0.68 mmol , 12.0 mL ) was added to a three - necked flask of poly(1-phenyl-1,3-butadiene ) solution containing poly(1-phenyl-1,3-butadiene ) ( 0.5 g ) and cyclohexane ( 10.0 mL ) under argon , and then the reaction temperature was increased to 50 ° C . After stirring for 4 h , the mixture reaction was quenched with 1 % aqueous solution of Na2CO3 ( 5.0 mL ) , and the mixture solution was wash with water three times , the products were precipitated with sufficient methanol , isolating the filtrate and then dried under vacuum overnight , all the obtained cyclization products as light - yellow powder .

Under a nitrogen atmosphere , a toluene solution of catalyst ( 4.9 mg , 10 μmol ) , [ Ph3C][B(C6F5)4 ] ( 9.2 mg , 10 μmol ) and a toluene solution of pMSS ( 197 mg , 1.0 mmol ) were mixed together at 18 ° C and kept stirring for 5 min . Then , the reaction was terminated by addition of a small amount of methanol and poured into ethanol ( 150 mL ) to precipitate . The polymer was dried to a constant weight ( 138 mg , yield : 70.1 % ) in a vacuum oven at 40 ° C .

The copolymerization of pMSS ( 197 mg , 1.0 mmol ) and St ( 104 mg , 1.0 mmol ) was performed with pyridyl - methylene - fluorenyl - supported complex ( 4.9 mg , 10 μmol ) and [ Ph3C][B(C6F5)4 ] ( 9.2 mg , 10 μmol ) at 18 ° C for a 5 min . Then , the reaction was terminated by addition of a small amount of methanol and poured into ethanol ( 150 mL ) to precipitate . The polymer was dried to a constant weight ( 273 mg , yield : 90.8 % ) in a vacuum oven at 40 ° C .

dimethyl - protected cyclic lysine ( 156 mg ) and t - BuP4 ( 50μL , 0.8 M in hexane ) were weighted and added to a flame - dried polymerization tube . The mixture was dried in a vacuum and purged with nitrogen at room temperature for 30 minutes to remove hexane . Then N - benzoyl - α - dimethylamino - ε - caprolactam ( 10.4 mg ) was added and purged with nitrogen for three times . Than anhydrous DMAC ( 200 μL ) was added and the polymerization was allowed to proceed at 140 ° C for 6 h under nitrogen atmosphere . After cool to room temperature , the polymerization was quenched by addition of 1 mL of benzoic acid / THF ( 10 mg / mL ) and then precipitated in ethyl acetate / diethyl ether ( 1/1 ) to get the polymer ( yield ~80 % ) .

In a 20 mL scintillation vial , poly(propylene maleate ) ( 1.00 g , .618 mmol , 6.18 mmol alkene ) was dissolved in 2 mL of glacial acetic acid and 2 mL of CHCl3 . The appropriate amount of zinc dust was then added to the flask and the vial was sonicated . At the appropriate time points the vial was homogenized by shaking and an aliquot was removed . The aliquot was filtered to remove the zinc dust and a 1H NMR was taken for conversion analysis . The amount of total succinate content was determined by the integrations of the maleate peak and the succinate peak at δ = 6.28 ppm and 2.66 ppm , respectively . This was compared to the amount of reduction in the M1 subunit by the integration ratio of the initiator methylene unit at δ = 4.78 ppm and δ = 4.70 ppm .

poly(DMCL ) ( 2 g ) was dissolved in methanol ( 40 ml ) in a round bottomed flask ( 100 mL ) . 3.64 g iodomethane was added to the solution . The reaction mixture was stirred at 40 ° C for 40 h and then precipitated in ethyl acetate / diethyl ether ( 1/1 ) to get the poly(ε - lysine ) mimics ( yield~95 % ) .

For the copolymerization at 23 ° C a mixture of 0.1 mL of β - farnesene ( 0.42 mmol , [ Far]0 = 0.56 mol L–1 ) and 0.05 mL of styrene ( 0.42 mmol , [ S]0 = 0.56 mol L–1 ) in ( 0.6 mL of cyclohexane ) was filled into NMR tubes and sealed with rubber septa . After initiation with 0.01 mL of sec - butyllithium ( [ Ini]0 = 0.017 mol L–1 ) via syringe , the solution was vigorously homogenized by shaking several times . Subsequently , the NMR tube was immediately inserted in the 1H NMR spectrometer . A spectrum was recorded every 30 s with one scan for 4 h.

The deoxygenated G3 was dissolved in dry DCM ( 1 mL , degassed via three freeze – pump – thaw cycles ) and added to the flask containing the monomer ( 100 mg ) dissolved in dry , degassed DCM ( 2 mL ) . After 30 min of stirring at RT , the active species were quenched with ethyl vinyl ether ( 0.5 mL ) and the mixture was stirred for another 30 min . Polymers were precipitated into methanol multiple times . Nearly quantitative yields were obtained for the polymerization .

9,9-Dibutyl-2,7-diethynyl-9H - fluorene ( 65 mg , 0.20 mmol ) , NH4Cl ( 32 mg , 0.60 mmol ) , 4,4'-oxydibenzenesulfonyl azide ( 76 mg , 0.20 mmol ) , KOH ( 11 mg , 0.20 mmol ) , CuI ( 8 mg , 0.04 mmol ) , and 1 mL of CH2Cl2 / THF mixture ( v / v , 3/1 ) were added into a 10 mL Schlenk tube equipped with a magnetic stir bar under N2 atmosphere . 40 μL of Et3N was then added into the reaction mixture which was stirred at room temperature ( ~25 oC ) for 40 min , with gas bubbles generated . The resulting mixture was diluted with 2 mL of DMF , which was then added into 100 mL of ethyl ether through a cotton filter to precipitate the polymer . The precipitates were filtered , washed with methanol ( 30 mL × 3 ) , and dried at 40 oC under vacuum atmosphere overnight to afford a pale yellow solid in 96 % yield .

A solution of bis(dodecylsulfanylthiocarbonyl ) disulfide ( 1 equiv ) in n - butyl acrylate ( 40 equiv ) was added to a solution of benzyl bromide ( 2 equiv ) in DMF ( 10 M monomer concentration , 0.8 monomer / solvent mole ratio ) in a 4 mL vial . Bismuth oxide ( 0.2 equiv ) was added to the solution . The reaction vial was sealed with a septum and degassed by sparging with argon for 15 min . The mixture was irradiated under CFL ( 23 W , 1610 lm , 4 mL vial held 1.5 cm away , 7.6 ± 0.8 mW cm–2 ) at 36 ° C for 5 h. The catalyst was removed via centrifugation ( 2000 rcf ) , and the polymer was precipitated twice in a methanol / water mixture ( 10 % v / v ) . The swollen precipitate was dissolved in acetone , further purified under dialysis ( 2000 Da cutoff ) in acetone , and concentrated under vacuum . A light - yellow viscous liquid was obtained .

Under an argon atmosphere , the potassium naphthalenide solution was injected dropwise into a reactor filled with PEO macroinitiator in dry THF until a green color was retained . Subsequently , EGE was added and polymerized for 24 h at 50 ° C .

PEG ( 15.0 g , 5.0 mmol ) was dissolved in toluene ( 50 mL ) with stirring at room temperature for 30 min . Then , 3-bromo-1-propyne ( 1.5 mL , 15.0 mmol ) was added . To the solution , NaH ( 0.72 g , 30.0 mmol ) was added slowly with stirring . After stirring for 12 h , 3-bromo-1-propyne ( 1.5 mL , 15.0 mmol ) and NaH ( 0.72 g , 30.0 mmol ) were further added to the reaction mixture with continuous stirring for 36 h. The inorganic precipitate was removed from the reaction mixture by filtration , and the solvent was evaporated under reduced pressure . The residue was dissolved in an aqueous solution of NaCl ( 5.1 wt % , 100 mL ) . Then , the product was extracted from the aqueous solution with dichloromethane ( 3 × 50 mL ) . The organic phases were combined . The combined organic layer was washed with an aqueous solution of NaCl ( 5.1 wt % , 2 × 100 mL ) . After drying the organic phase with MgSO4 , the MgSO4 was removed by filtration . The solvent was evaporated under reduced pressure , and the product was dried under reduced pressure at 45 ° C for 24 h. A pale yellow solid was obtained ( 13.8 g , 92 % ) . 1H NMR ( 500 MHz , CDCl3 ) δ ( ppm ) : 4.23–4.17 ( brs , 2H ) , 3.75–3.50 ( br , 4H ) , and 2.45–2.40 ( brs , H ) .

A solution of functionalized polyethylene glycol ( 2.1 g , 0.7 mmol ) in DMF ( 6 mL ) , CuSO4·5H2O ( 0.0175 g , 0.07 mmol ) , and sodium ( + ) -ascorbate ( 0.0198 g , 0.2 mmol ) were placed in a 100 mL flask equipped with a three - way stopcock under a nitrogen atmosphere . The mixture was stirred for 5 min . Then , NaN3 ( 1.63 g , 35 mmol ) and 3-Bromo-1-propyne ( 2.4 mL , 20 mmol ) were added to the reaction mixture . The reaction mixture was warmed using an oil bath thermostated at 80 ° C with stirring . After 72 h , the reaction mixture was added to DMF ( 50 mL ) . The precipitate was removed by filtration . The volatile fractions were evaporated under reduced pressure . Dichloromethane ( 100 mL ) was then added , and the precipitate was recovered by centrifugation . The polymer obtained was dried at 60 ° C under vacuum . A brown solid was obtained ( 1.6 g ) . 1H NMR ( 500 MHz , DMSO - d6 ) δ ( ppm ) : 8.49–7.54 ( br , H ) , 6.16–5.45 ( br , 2H ) , 4.75–4.35 ( br , 2H ) , and 3.75–3.31 ( br , 4H ) . Calcd for ( C202H338N60O69)(CuSO4 ) : C , 49.81 ; H , 6.99 ; and N , 17.25 % . Found : C , 47.97 ; H , 6.85 ; and N , 19.36 % ( ash , 1.44 % ) .

PEO monomethyl ether ( 4.00 g , 2 mmol , 1 equiv ) was dissolved in 80 mL dry DCM and chilled to 0 ° C . Triethylamine ( 2.8 mL , 20 mmol , 10 equiv ) and p - nitrobenzenesulfonyl chloride ( 4.43 g , 20 mmol , 10 equiv ) were then added . The reaction mixture was allowed to stir for 10 h at 0 ° C under an argon atmosphere . The reaction mixture was then concentrated under vacuum and the high excess of unreacted reagents was then extracted three times with 400 mL of isopropanol at RT , exploiting the poor solubility of PEO at RT in isopropanol . It was then placed into a dialysis membrane ( regenerated cellulose , MWCO : 3.5 kDa , RC6 , Spectra Por , USA ) and dialyzed against acetonitrile for 2 days ( the solution was exchanged four times , with at least 8 h in - between exchanges ) . The purified product was stored under an argon atmosphere , which can be stable over 12 months , as was confirmed by 1H NMR analysis . The resulting ω - nosylation ( 96 % ) was determined by integrating the peak from the terminal group of PEO at 3.38 ppm and the peak of the methylene group next to the nosylate at 4.32 ppm . 1H NMR ( 500 MHz , CDCl3 , 295 K , δ , ppm ) : 3.38 ( s , 3H , −OCH2CH2O – CH3 ) , 3.65 ( m , 180H , OCH2CH2O ) , 4.32 ( t , J = 4.6 Hz , 2H , Ar – O – CH2− ) , 8.15 ( m , 2H , Ar - NO2 ) , 8.41 ( m , 2H , Ar - NO2 ) .

In a 2 mL vial , a solution containing PEO - Nos macroinitiator ( 1 equiv , 0171 g , 0.09 mmol ) , chlorobenzene ( 1.57 mL ) , and EHOx ( 22 equiv , 0.394 g , 2 mmol ) was prepared in a glovebox . The copolymerization was carried out in a microwave oven at 140 ° C for 40 min . In the glovebox , 0.104 g of EtOz ( 0.5 M , 1.1 mmol ) was added to the diblock copolymer mixture . The second copolymerization was carried out again in a microwave oven at 140 ° C . n. After 20 min of microwave irradiation , the polymerization mixture was cooled down to room temperature . The mixture was then dissolved in 50 mL of EtOH . To remove chlorobenzene , homopolymers , and residual monomers , the solution was placed into an ultrafiltration reactor ( from Millipore Corporation , 5 kDa RC membrane ) . To achieve total purification , five cycles ( 30 min ) , with 50 mL of EtOH and under a pressure of 5 bar , were performed . To dissolve the polymer , 30 mL of EtOH was added into the reactor for 10 min without applying any pressure . After removal of the solution , two other cycles of 10 min were proceeded . The solvent of the combined solutions was removed under reduced pressure . Products were characterized by 1H NMR spectroscopy .

Poly(propylene maleate ) ( 10.00 g , 6.18 mmol , 61.8 mmol alkene ) was dissolved in 40 mL of CHCl3 . Diethylamine ( 0.96 mL , 9.28 mmol , 0.15 eq to alkene ) was added and the mixture was refluxed overnight . After full conversion , the solution was washed twice with saturated sodium phosphate buffer ( pH = 6 ) and concentrated under reduced pressure to afford poly(propylene fumarate ) .

A microwave vial was prepared containing methyl p - toluenesulfonate ( 0.066 mmol , 1 eq ) , EHOx ( 60 eq ) , and acetonitrile ( 2 ml ) . The microwave vial was then heated to 140 ° C for 30 min to achieve full monomer conversion . In the glovebox , EtOz ( 2 mmol ) was then added to the diblock copolymer mixture . This second copolymerization was then carried out as well at 140 ° C for 12 min . After microwave irradiation , the polymerization mixture was cooled down to room temperature . The mixture was then dissolved in 50 mL of EtOH . To remove chlorobenzene , homopolymers , and residual monomers , the solution was placed into an ultrafiltration reactor ( from Millipore Corporation , 3.5 kDa RC membrane ) . To achieve total purification , five cycles ( 30 min ) with 50 mL of EtOH and under a pressure of 5 bar were performed . To dissolve the polymer , 30 mL of EtOH was added into the reactor for 30 min without applying any pressure . After removal of the solution , two other cycles of 30 min and 30 mL EtOH were conducted . The solvent of the combined solutions was removed under reduced pressure . 1H NMR ( 500 MHz , CDCl3 , 295 K , δ , ppm ) : 0.86 ( m , 6H , CH3 ) , 1.1 ( m , 3H , N(COCH2CH3)–CH2CH2 ) , 1.24 ( m , 9H , CH(CH2CH3)–CH2CH2CH2CH3 ) , 1.54 ( m , 2H , N(COCH2CH2 ) ) , 2.24 ( m , 4H , N(COCH2CH2 ) ) , 3.38 ( s , 3H , −OCH2CH2O – CH3 ) , 3.43 ( m , 4H , N(COCH2CH2)–CH2CH2 ) . PEHOx60-b - PEtOz34 . D̵M = 1.22 . Mn = 15,200 Da . f = 22 % .

MeOTs ( 124 g , 0.665 mol ) and EtOx ( 3965 g , 40.00 mol , 60.2 equiv . ) were dissolved under an argon atmosphere in dry MeCN ( 5860 mL ) in a 10 L Normag reactor . After a reaction time of 6.5 h under reflux conditions , the polymerization was terminated with 270 mL of deionized water . The solvent was removed under a reduced pressure and the residue was dissolved in dichloromethane ( 20 L ) and washed with saturated aqueous sodium bicarbonate solution ( 10 L ) and brine ( 2 × 10 L ) . The organic phase was dried over a mixture of sodium sulfate ( 15 kg ) and magnesium sulfate ( 4 kg ) , and the solvent was removed under reduced pressure . The product was finally dried in vacuo for 14 days ( yield : 3848 g ) .

PEtOx ( 80.0 g , 12.5 mmol ) was dissolved in aqueous hydrochloric acid ( 6 M , 600 mL ) and heated to 90 ° C for 24 h. Volatiles were removed under reduced pressure , and the residue was dissolved in deionized water ( 1600 mL ) . Aqueous NaOH ( 3 M , 300 mL ) was added in portions to reach a pH value of 10 , resulting in the precipitation of the polymer . Subsequently , the polymer was filtered off and purified by recrystallization in water ( 800 mL ) . Subsequent to drying in vacuo overnight , PEI was obtained as a white solid ( yield : 47.5 g ) . 1H NMR ( 300 MHz , CD3OD ) : δ = 3.65 ( t , CH2–OH ) , 2.74 ( s , CH2–CH2 ) , 2.41 ( s , CH3–N ) , 1.12 ppm ( t , CH3 EtOx ) ; degree of hydrolysis ( DH ) = 99 % .

PEI ( 45.0 g , 17.0 mmol ) was dissolved in methanol ( 1100 mL ) under stirring , and aqueous hydrogen peroxide solution ( 72 mL , 30 % w / w , 0.7 equiv . per amine unit ) was added dropwise . Subsequent to stirring for 3 days at room temperature , the solvent was removed under reduced pressure and the product was dried in vacuo for 7 days at room temperature and for 1 day at 70 ° C . oxPEI was obtained as a brown solid ( yield : 29.1 g ) .

3.2 g ( 1.0 mmol ) of oxPEI was predried under vacuum for 2 h at 70 ° C and subsequently dissolved in dry DMF ( 19.2 mL ) under an argon atmosphere . Triethylamine ( 115 mmol ) was added followed by a dropwise addition of acetyl chloride ( 84 mmol ) in dry DMF ( 19.2 ml ) while cooling the mixture in an ice bath . Additional dry DMF ( 19.2 ml ) was used to flash residues off the flask walls . The reaction mixture was allowed to warm to room temperature and stirred for another 24 h. The reaction mixture was directly precipitated into ice - cold diethyl ether ( −80 ° C , 700 mL ) . The residue was dissolved in DMF ( 70 mL ) and the precipitation was repeated twice . The raw product was dissolved in deionized water , Amberlite IRA-67 ion exchange resin was added , and the mixture was stirred for 1.5 h at room temperature . Amberlite IRA-67 was filtered off and water removed under reduced pressure . The crude product was dissolved in methanol and precipitated in ice - cold diethyl ether ( −80 ° C ) twice to yield dPMeOx as a brown solid ( yield : 1.9 g ) .

In a N2-filled glovebox , 3-(2-(methylthio)ethyl)morpholine-2,5-dione was dissolved in anhydrous CHCl3 . Then 1,3-Bis[3,5-bis(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]thiourea was added to the solution and the mixture was stirred at room 5 min . Finally , BnOH and DBU were separately added to the mixture . The solution was rapidly stirred at 25 oC oil bath . After 3 h , benzoic acid was added to quench the reaction . The polymer was purified by precipitated into diethyl ether , centrifuged and dried in vacuo . 1H NMR of ( 300 MHz , CDCl3 ) : δ 7.98~7.97 ( d , 1H ) , 4.81~4.60 ( dd , 2H ) , 4.52~4.46 ( q , 1H ) , 2.71~2.53 ( m , 2H ) , 2.27~2.21 ( q , 2H ) , 2.13 ( s , 3H ) . 13C NMR ( 100 MHz , CDCl3 ): δ 170.49 , 169.25 , 62.93 , 52.52 , 30.12 , 29.36 , 15.30 .

The poly(ester amide ) was suspended in 30 % H2O2 and 1 % HCOOH in water and stirred at room temperature for 6 h. After quenching with a few drops of 1 M sodium thiosulfate aqueous solution , the reaction mixture was transferred to a 2000 MWCO dialysis bag and dialyzed against DI water for 48 h with water changes twice per day . The content of the dialysis bag was then lyophilized to provide the product ( 95 % yield ) . 1H NMR ( 300 MHz , D2O ) : δ 4.6~4.4 ( m , 3H ) , 2.93~2.73 ( m , 2H ) , 2.57 ( s , 3H ) , 2.36~2.04 ( m , 2H ) .

The poly(ester amide ) was suspended in 0.2 M aqueous formic acid ( 10 mg / mL ) . Propargyl bromide was added . The reaction mixture was covered with foil and stirred at room temperature for 48 h. The reaction was then diluted with water , transferred to a 2000 MWCO dialysis bag , and dialyzed against 0.10 M NaCl solution for 24 h , followed by DI water for 48 h with water changes twice per day . The contents of the dialysis bag were then lyophilized to provide the product ( 96 % yield ) . 1H NMR ( 300 MHz , DMSO ) : δ 5.72~5.68 ( t , 1H ) , 4.69~4.59 ( m , 1H ) , 4.36~4.30 ( m , 1H ) , 4.24~4.16 ( m , 1H ) , 3.85~3.83 ( d , 2H ) , 2.39~2.10 ( m , 4H ) , 2.04~1.92 ( m , 1H ) , 1.22 ( s , 3H ) .

In the glovebox , a 350 mL heavy - walled glass equipped with a stirring bar was loaded with toluene ( 50 mL ) and MAO ( 900 eq ) . The reactor was then taken out and interfaced with propylene gas . The solution was saturated with propylene ( 50 psi ) at 0oC for 30 min . A toluene solution ( 3 mL ) of the titanium catalyst ( 20 µmoL , 1 eq ) was injected via a gastight syringe to initiate polymerization . After 2 h , the reactor was quenched with methanol and vented . The polymer precipitated in a mixed solution of methanol ( 500 mL ) was collected by filtration , washed with methanol , and dried under vacuum at 60 ° C until it achieved a constant weight .

rac - LA and rac - β - BL ( 48:52 molar ratio , total 4 mmol ) were weighed into a vial equipped with a stir bar , to which 1.8 mL toluene was added . 1 ( 0.01 mmol ) was added via a syringe to the stirred monomer solution . After 1 h , the reaction vial was removed from the glove box and the reaction was quenched by the addition of a drop of water . The solvents were removed on a rotary evaporator . Purification was achieved by precipitation : The polymer was dissolved in the minimum volume of chloroform ( ≈5 mL ) , and the resulting solution was added dropwise via a pipette to 50 mL of methanol . The precipitated polymer was collected by filtration under reduced pressure and dried in a vacuum oven at 60 ° C overnight .

In a nitrogenfilled glovebox , 16 mg of PPNCl ( 0.028 mmol ) was dissolved in 1.4 mL of THF in a 10 mL autoclave with a magnetic stirrer . Then 14 μL of BEt3 ( 1 M in THF , 0.014 mmol ) , 207 mg of PA ( 1.4 mmol ) , and 1.4 mL of CHO ( 14 mmol ) were added sequentially . The autoclave was sealed , taken out of glovebox , and charged with CO2 to reach a pressure of 10 bar . After stirring at 80 ° C for 0.5 h , the reaction system was cooled to room temperature with a water bath . After residual CO2 was released , the reaction system was quenched with HCl solution ( 1 M in THF ) . An aliquot of the crude product was taken for 1H NMR analysis to determine the PA conversion . The resultant polymer was purified by repeated precipitation from methanol and dried under vacuum at 35 ° C overnight .

The synthesis of the monomers , as well as the polymerization , were performed using Schlenk techniques . The white solid , ( 2-methylallyl)triphenyl arsonium tetrafluoroborate ( 22.3 mmol , 10.00 g ) was added into a 250 mL Schlenk flask , which was fire - dried three times . The flask was vacuumed for at least 3 hours to remove water or air absorbed by the ylide salt . Then , 70 mL dry THF was added into the flask under argon . n - Butyllithium ( 1.6 M in hexane , 13.90 mL ) was added to the suspension dropwise . The suspension was cooled down to -78 oC and stirred overnight . After heating the solution to 0 oC , a clear red solution was obtained and stirred for another hour . After a dose of triethylborane was added to the solution , an instantaneous discoloration of the solution was observed . After stirring at 50 oC for one hour , the solution was treated with a pre - mixed mixture of 30 % aqueous hydrogen peroxide ( 10 mL ) and 15 % aqueous sodium hydroxide ( 10 mL ) . The mixture was then vigorously stirred for 2 hours at 50 oC. The aqueous phase was extracted with THF ( 30 mL x 3 ) . After concentrating under vacuum , the crude product was dissolved in 10 ml DCM and precipitated in methanol three times .

To an oven dried , high - pressure vessel ( 15 mL ) , 5-bromo - N - hexyl - N - methylthiophene-3-carboxamide ( 91.28 mg , 0.3 mmol , 1 equiv . ) , neodecanoic acid ( 25.8 mg , 0.15 mmol , 0.5 equiv ) , tris(o - methoxyphenylphosphine ) ( 25.4 mg , 0.072 mmol , 0.24 equiv ) , and Cs2CO3 ( 146.6 mg , 0.45 mmol , 1.5 equiv ) was added . The vessel was then sparged with a stream of nitrogen for 15 minutes . CPME ( 1.5 mL ) , which was degassed prior with N2 for 15 minutes , was added through the rubber septum to give a 0.2 M concentration . PdCl2(PPh3)2 ( 7.16 mg , 0.0102 mmol , 0.06 equiv ) was added quickly and the rubber septum was replaced with a Teflon screwcap equipped with a rubber o - ring . The sealed vessel was then placed into a preheated oil bath ( 110 ° C ) and stirred for 72 hours . The vial was then removed from heat , the mixture was precipitated into a chilled 50 % : 50 % MeOH / water solution with high - stirring . The solids were then filtered into a Soxhlet thimble dried under nitrogen for 30 minutes , and purified via Soxhlet extraction ( hexanes , and CHCl3 ) . The CHCl3 fraction was concentrated to ~0.5 mL , and re - precipitated into cold hexanes with vigorous stirring . The dark red fluffy polymer was then filtered and further dried overnight under vacuum ( ~100 mtorr ) .

A solution of 1:5 NaDPA : NaBPh4 in THF was transferred into a reaction flask and cooled to −98 ° C . The polymerization proceeded by adding a solution of furfuryl isocyanate in THF to the initiator solution , in which the [ FIC]0 was close to 0.250 mol L−1 . At 900s , the polymerization was terminated by adding a solution of HCl : methanol in THF . The resulting polymer was precipitated in cool methanol , filtered , and dried under vacuum . The anionic polymerization yielded poly(furfuryl isocyanate ) ( PFIC ) .

The reactor was charged with methylcyclohexane ( 15.5 g ) containing ( Oct)3Al ( 18.3 mg , 50 μmol - Al ) , and the temperature was raised to 80 ° C . A solution of ( 9-decenyl)2Zn ( 103.2 mg , 300 μmol - Zn ) in methylcyclohexane ( 10.0 g ) was charged ; subsequently , the methylcyclohexane solution ( 0.30 g ) containing the pyridylamidohafnium catalyst ( 2.0 μmol - Hf ) that was activated with [ ( C18H37)2MeNH]+[B(C6F5)4]− ( 1.0 equiv ) in benzene was injected . Ethylene / propylene mixed gas ( 10 bar/10 bar , total 20 bar ) was charged from a tank into the reactor at 20 bar , and the polymerization was performed for 40 min . The temperature increased spontaneously to 120 ° C within 2 min and subsequently maintained at 100–110 ° C with a controller . The pressure decreased from 20 to 18 bar . After the remaining ethylene / propylene mixed gas was vented off , acetic acid ( 2.0 mL ) and ethanol ( 20 mL ) were successively injected . The generated polymer was collected and dried in a vacuum oven at 160 ° C for 2 h to obtain 14.4 g of the polymer .

The homopolymerization of styrene was started via the addition of the desired amount of monomer to sec - Butyllithium in toluene . The temperature of the reaction flask was controlled by an external , stirred water bath containing an electronic temperature sensor .

The flask was charged with prescribed volume of toluene and 5-(N , N - Dimethylamino)-1-pentene under a nitrogen atmosphere , and then filled with the propylene gas , followed by the addition of AliBu3 . After equilibration at 25 oC for 5 min , the polymerization reaction was started by adding the prescribed amount of zirconium catalyst and trityltetra(pentafluorophenyl)borate . After 10 min , the reactor was vented . The resulting copolymers were precipitated from ethanol , filtered , washed three times with ethanol and acetone , and then dried under vacuum at 40 ° C to constant weight .

In a 25 mL round bottom flask , PPV 1 ( 20.0 mg , 76.8 μmol ) , p - toluenesulfonyl hydrazide ( 143 mg , 0.768 mmol ) and tripropylamine ( 116 mg , 0.807 mmol ) was dissolved in 10 mL toluene . The reaction mixture was stirred at 110 0C for 3 h then cooled to room temperature and precipitated into 100 mL methanol . The product was collected by filtration and dried to give 13.9 mg of a light yellow solid ( 69 % ) . 1H NMR ( 400 MHz , CDCl3 ) δ 6.73 - 6.65 ( bs , 2H ) , 3.87 - 3.71 ( m , 5H ) , 2.92 - 2.75 ( bs , 4H ) , 1.85 – 1.18 ( m , 12H ) , 1.01 - 0.78 ( m , 5H ) .

In a 3-neck round bottom flask , 1,4-bis(bromomethyl)-2,5-bis((8-bromooctyl)oxy)benzene ( 160 mg , 0.240 mmol ) was dissolved in 15 mL THF . The solution was bubbled with argon for 5 minutes . Using a syringe pump , a solution of potassium tert - butoxide ( 112 mg , 4.2 mmol ) in 40 mL THF was then added into the reaction chamber at 1.00 mL / min at 50 oC under argon . The reaction was stirred another 3 h after complete addition of the base solution . The reaction mixture was cooled to room temperature and then precipitated into 150 mL methanol . The polymer was collected by filtration and was washed with acetone and methanol to give 82 mg of a deep orange solid ( 64 % ) . 1H NMR ( 400 MHz , CDCl3 ) δ 7.54 - 7.42 ( bs , 2H ) , 7.19 - 7.11 ( bs , 2H ) , 4.11 - 4.02 ( bs , 4H ) , 3.38 ( t , J = 6.7 Hz , 4H ) , 1.94 – 1.78 ( m , 8H ) , 1.48 - 1.30 ( m , 16H ) .

In a seal tube , PPX ( 20 mg , 37.5 μmol ) was dissolved in 5 mL toluene and trimethylamine ( 12 mg , 0.20 mmol ) was added under an argon environment . The reaction mixture was stirred at 90 oC for 16 h. The reaction mixture was cooled to room temperature and precipitated in 50 mL diethyl ether . The solid was collected by filtration , washed with diethyl ether , and dried to give 18.5 mg of a light yellow solid ( 74 % ) . 1H NMR ( 400 MHz , CDCl3 ) δ 6.78 - 6.44 ( bs , 1H ) , 3.96 - 3.80 ( bs , 3H ) , 3.17 - 3.33 ( bs , 12H ) , 2.88 - 2.74 ( bs , 3H ) , 1.89 - 1.70 ( m , 6H ) , 1.62 - 1.34 ( m , 12H ) .

Initiator ( 0.08 mmol , 1.0 mol . equiv . ) and CuBr ( 1.0 mol . equiv . ) were added to a 10 mL Schlenk tube in a glove box . The tube was sealed with a rubber septa , removed from the box , and attached to a Schlenk line . Purified styrene was added ( 300 mol . equiv . ) and the solution was frozen in liquid nitrogen . PMDETA ( 2.0 mol . equiv . ) was added and the Shlenk tube was re - submerged in liquid nitrogen . Under a hard Ar purge , the rubber septa was removed and the Schlenk tube was quickly sealed using its screw - on stopper . Freeze - pump - thaw cycles were completed until bubbling of the thawing solution subsided . The Schlenk tube was then submerged into a 70 ºC oil bath and heated for 12 h. After cooling back to RT , the polymer solution was diluted with DCM , passed through a short plug of silica gel to remove copper , and precipitated into stirring methanol . The precipitate was re - dissolved in DCM and precipitated again into methanol . Overall yield of polymer was 60 % , not accounting for conversion . Representative NMR characterization : 1H NMR ( 499 MHz , CDCl3 , δ ) : 7.39 ( s , 2H ) , 6.3 - 7.3 ( br , 5H per repeat unit ) , 6.16 ( s , 2H ) , 5.07 ( d , J = 79.9 Hz , 1H ) , 4.76 ( s , 1H ) , 4.50 ( d , J = 51.2 Hz , 1H ) , 3.54 ( s , 2H ) , 3.35 ( s , 2H ) , 3.25 ( s , 1H ) , 3.10 ( s , 1H ) , 3.02 ( s , 1H ) , 2.93 ( s , 1H ) , 1.7 - 2.2 ( br , 1H per repeat unit ) , 1.2 - 1.7 ( br , 2H per repeat unit ) .

In a nitrogenfilled glovebox , 16 mg of PPNCl ( 0.028 mmol ) dissolved in 1.4 mL of THF , 14 μL of BEt3 ( 1 M in THF , 0.014 mmol ) , 207 mg of PA ( 1.4 mmol ) , and 1.4 mL of CHO ( 14 mmol ) was added to a 10 mL autoclave with a magnetic stirrer . The autoclave was sealed , taken out of glovebox , and put into an oil bath of 80 ° C , and the mixture was stirred until full consumption of the PA monomer . Then the autoclave was cooled to 0 ° C and charged with CO2 to reach a pressure of 10 bar . After stirring at 80 ° C for 1 h , the reaction system was cooled to room temperature with a water bath . After residual CO2 was released , the reaction system was quenched with HCl solution ( 1 M in THF ) . The resultant polymer was purified by repeated precipitation from methanol and dried under vacuum at 35 ° C overnight .

In a glove box , macromonomer ( 100 mg ) was added to a screw cap vial and dissolved in THF ( 2 mL ) . In another vial a stock solution of G3 in THF was prepared ( typically ~2 M concentration ) . The polymerization was initiated by adding 10 uL of G3 solution into the macromonomer solution while rapidly stirring . The vial was sealed and stirred for ca . 12 h. Next , the vial was fit with a septum , brought out of the box , and terminated with an excess of EVE . The polymer solution was diluted with ~1 mL of DCM and precipitated into stirring methanol . The precipitate was collected and dried under reduced pressure .

Under a nitrogen atmosphere , a toluene solution of scandium catalyst ( 5.7 mg , 10 μmol ) , a toluene solution of [ Ph3C][B(C6F5)4 ] ( 9.2 mg , 10 μmol ) , and ortho - fluorostyrene ( 305 mg , 2.5 mmol ) were mixed together at 25 ° C and kept stirring for 2 min . Then , the reaction was terminated by addition of acidified MeOH ( HCl , 10 wt % ) , and the polymer was collected and purified by pouring into ethanol ( 150 mL ) to precipitate . The polymer was dried to a constant weight ( 302 mg , yield : 99 % ) in a vacuum oven at 40 ° C .

The copolymerization of ortho - fluorostyrene ( 305 mg , 2.5 mmol ) and styrene ( 265 mg , 2.5 mmol ) was performed with scandium catalyst ( 5.7 mg , 10 μmol ) and [ Ph3C][B(C6F5)4 ] ( 9.2 mg , 10 μmol ) at 25 ° C for 3 min . The reaction was terminated by addition of acidified MeOH ( HCl , 10 wt % ) , and the polymer was collected and purified by pouring into ethanol ( 150 mL ) to precipitate . The polymer was dried to a constant weight ( 570 mg , yield : 100 % ) in a vacuum oven at 40 ° C .

To a vigorously stirred solution of cyclopropene ( 20 mg , 9.3 × 10–2 mmol ) in dried DCM ( 1.5 mL ) was added a solution of grubbs catalyst ( 3.9 mg , 4.7 × 10–3 mmol , 5 mol % ) in dried DCM ( 0.5 mL ) . The mixture was stirred under ambient temperature for 2 h and then quenched with excess ethyl vinyl ether ( 0.5 mL ) . After stirring for 30 min , solvent was removed in vacuo and the residue was dried under vacuum and precipitated in methanol ( 5 mL × 3 ) to give a crude mixture which was subjected to Soxhlet extraction sequentially with methanol and DCM . In the DCM fraction , solvent was removed in vacuo and the solid residue was dried to furnish product ( Mn = 4000 , PDI = 1.14 , 14 mg , 70 % ) : 1H NMR ( 400 MHz , CDCl3 ) δ 3.83–4.02 ( 7 H , br ) , 5.80–5.82 ( 2 H , br m ) , 6.28–6.31 ( 2 H , br m ) , 7.84–7.91 ( 2 H , br m ) ; 13C NMR ( 100 MHz , CDCl3 ) δ 41.4–42.2 , 51.7 , 61.2–61.8 , 110.2 , 115.0 , 118.7–119.1 , 126.2 , 127.9 , 128.7 , 130.2 , 131.2 , 132.2 , 133.3–134.0 , 136.3 , 140.6 , 153.9–154.1 , 167.0–167.3 .

Dichloromethane , hexane , IPVE , VCHO , and MEK were sequentially added into the tube using dry syringes . The polymerization was started by the addition of a prechilled solution of B(C6F5)3 in dichloromethane to the monomer solution at −78 ° C . After a predetermined time , the reaction was terminated by the addition of methanol containing a small amount of aqueous ammonia . The quenched mixture was diluted with hexane and then washed with water . The volatiles were then removed under reduced pressure at 50 ° C to yield a polymer .

In a glove box , methyl lactate ( 0.6 mL , 0.06 mmol ) and PDD ( 115.2 mg , 0.6 mmol ) was dissolved in CH2Cl2 ( 2.0 mL ) to which 7.32 mg ( 0.06 mmol ) DMAP was added . The conversion of monomer was measured by 1H NMR spectroscopy . Then the reaction mixture was diluted with CH2Cl2 ( 2.0 mL ) and washed with cold 2 mol / L HCl ( 2 × 5.0 mL ) , brine ( 5.0 mL ) and dried over Na2SO4 . The solvent was removed by evaporation to give the polymer as a white solid .

rac - PDD ( 192 mg , 1 mmol ) was dissolved in toluene ( 2.0 mL ) , to which methyl glycolate zirconium complex ( 100 µL , 0.01 mmol , 0.1 M solution in toluene ) was added . The solution then was rapidly stirred at room temperature for 5.5 h. The solution was quenched by a few drops of water . The polymer was precipitated via adding hexane ( 20 mL ) . A white solid was obtained by recrystallization using a mixed solvent of CH2Cl2 / n - hexane and was dried under vacuum

Butyl acrylate and AIBN in benzene was mixed with a carefully measured quantity of RAFT CTA in a 15 mL Schlenk tube equipped with a Rotaflo screw type PTFE needle valve stopcock . Then solution was degassed by three freeze – pump – thaw cycles and transferred into a NMR tubes in the glovebox under an argon atmosphere and sealed with rubber septa . The tube was heated at 60 ° C in a thermostated heating block for 18 h. The polymerization was quenched by freezing in liquid nitrogen . Then the excess amounts of monomer and solvent were removed by evaporation at ambient temperature under reduced pressure .

Copolymerization experiments were performed under Ar atmosphere by adding ε - CL in a stirring suspension of dimethoxybenzyl alcohol ( DMBA ) ( 1 equiv ) , NEt3 ( 2 equiv ) , and InCl3 ( 1 equiv ) , [ CL]0 = 3 M in Toluene . The reaction mixture was stirred at 60 ° C for 30 min . ε - DL in Toluene was then added to the stirring solution of PCL . The reaction mixture was stirred at 60 ° C for 5 h. An excess of benzoic acid was added to quench the catalyst , and the solvent was evaporated under vacuum . The block copolymer was then dissolved in a minimum of dichloromethane and precipitated in cold methanol , then filtered , and dried under vacuum . Conversion : > 99 % ( for both monomers ) ; yield : 90 % . SEC : Mn = 22000 g / mol , Đ = 1.24 . DSC : Tg = −57.8 ° C and Tm = 55.2 ° C . TGA : Td = 337 ° C . 1H NMR ( CDCl3 , 300 MHz , ppm ) : 6.47 ( d , J = 2.3 Hz , 2H , ortho - C6H3- CH2–O− ) , 6.37 ( t , J = 2.3 Hz , 1H , para - C6H3-CH2–O− ) , 5.03 ( s , 2H , ArCH2O− ) , 4.88–4.79 ( m , 50H , −CHO− ) , 4.04 ( m , 100H , −CH2O− ) , 3.75 ( s , 6H , 2(−OCH3 ) ) , 3.58 ( br s , 1H , −CH - OH , chain end by DL unit ) , 2.29–2.22 ( m , 200 H , CH2 ) , 1.60–1.46 ( m , 450 H , CH2 ) , 1.40–1.22 ( m , 450 H , CH2 ) , 0.89–0.84 ( m , 150 H , CH3 ) .

Polymerization experiments were performed under Ar atmosphere by adding ε - DL in a stirring suspension of benzyl alcohol ( 1 equiv ) , NEt3 ( 2 equiv ) , and InCl3 ( 1 equiv ) , [ M]0 = 3 M in toluene . The reaction mixture was stirred at 60 ° C for 30 min . An excess of benzoic acid was added to quench the catalyst , and the solvent was evaporated under vacuum . The polymer was then dissolved in a minimum of dichloromethane and precipitated two consecutive times in cold methanol , then filtered , and dried under vacuum . Isolated yield : 90 % .

BMA ( 8.0 g , 56.3 mmol ) , CDTPA ( 0.90 g , 2.2 mmol ) , ACPA ( 0.03 g , 0.11 mmol ) , 1,3,5-trioxane ( 0.40 g , 0.44 mmol ) , and 1,4-dioxane ( 4.8 mL ) were introduced in a roundbottom flask . The flask was purged with nitrogen for 30 min , sealed , and immersed in an oil bath at 80 ° C . After 20 h of polymerization , a sample was collected and a degassed mixture of S ( 11.7 g , 11.2 mmol ) , ACPA ( 0.03 g , 0.11 mmol ) , and 1,4-dioxane ( 10 mL ) was added to the polymerization . Polymerization was subsequently performed for an additional 17 h at 80 ° C , after which the product was obtained by precipitating twice in cyclohexane .

To anhydrous DMF ( 0.60 mL ) was added the MsAzet ( 0.44 mmol ) . To this solution was added a portion of the prepared nBuN(K)Ts ( 0.08 mL , 0.011 mmol ) . The reaction mixture was then heated to 120 ° C for 19 days . After this time , the reaction was then precipitated into water ( 15 mL ) , collected by centrifugation , and dried overnight under vacuum at 100 ° C . Characterization of p(MsAzet ) : brown amorphous glass ( 45.8 mg , 76.3 % isolated yield , Mn ( RI , SEC vs PS standards ) = 10.6 kDa , Đ = 1.06 , target Dp = 40 , actual Dp ( 1H NMR ) = 33 ) .

A solution of BrCH2-Co(acac)2 initiator ( 0.294 mmol in 3 mL of dried and degassed DMC ) was introduced into a 25 mL stainless - steel autoclave under an ethylene atmosphere using a syringe . The autoclave was pressurized using ethylene ( 500 bar ) and heated to 80 ° C using an oil bath and the reaction mixture was stirred magnetically at 500 rpm . After 1 h , the reaction was stopped by depressurizing the reactor . A solution of TEMPO ( 100 mg in 6 mL of DMC ) was then added to the reactor under argon and the mixture was stirred for a couple of hours at room temperature . The reactor was then opened and the reaction mixture was transferred into a vial under air . The vial was filled with fresh THF and the polymer was stirred for 10 min at 500 rpm , the PE settled at the bottom of the vial and the solvent was removed with a pipette . This operation was repeated three times . The same treatment was repeated three more times using an acidic solution of MeOH . The homopolymer was finally dried overnight under vacuum at 50 ° C

A solution of R - Co(acac)2 ( 40 mL , 0.0943 M stock solution in CH2Cl2 ) was introduced under an argon atmosphere in a round - bottom flask of 250 mL and evaporated to dryness under reduced pressure at room temperature . A solution of VAc ( 65 mL , 60.35 g , 0.702 mol ) was transferred into the flask with the dried organocobalt initiator . The polymerization of VAc was conducted at 40 ° C under an argon atmosphere to reach a conversion of ∼46 % after 150 min , to produce a macroinitiator with Mn , SEC = 8200 g mol–1 and Mw / Mn = 1.08 . Unreacted VAc was then removed under vacuum at room temperature .

A solution of PVAc - Co(acac)2 ( 1.97 g of PVAc - Co(acac)2 , 0.24 mmol ) in 6 mL DMC was transferred into a 25 mL stainless - steel autoclave under an ethylene atmosphere using a syringe . The autoclave was pressurized with ethylene ( 500 bar ) and heated to 60 ° C using an oil bath . The pressure was maintained manually during the polymerization and the reaction mixture was stirred magnetically at 500 rpm . After 4 h , the reaction was stopped by depressurization of the reactor . Polymerization was quenched through the addition of a solution of 100 mg of TEMPO ( 0.64 mmol ) in 6 mL of DMC . This solution was then precipitated in cold heptane under vigorous stirring and the purified polymer dried under vacuum at 60 ° C overnight .

Cyclobutene carboxylate , butyl acrylate , 4,4′-Azobis(4-cyanovaleric acid ) , and 4- cyano-4-[(dodecylsulfanylthiocarbonyl)sulfanyl]pentanoic acid were charged to a 25-mL Schlenk tube . The mixture was subsequently degassed via three freeze - pump - thaw cycles . All polymerizations were carried out neat , under N2 , for 16 hours at 85 oC. After this time , the mixture was dissolved in dichloromethane and precipitated into cold MeOH . The resulting polymer was dried under vacuum for two hours . The polymer was re - precipitated until residual monomer was undetectable .
nan

2,2′-azo - bis(4-methoxy-2,4-dimethyl valeronitrile ) ( 0.31 g , 1.0 mmol ) and γ - methylene - γ - butyrolactone ( 0.78 g , 8.0 mmol ) were placed in a 15 mL Schlenk tube , degassed by three freeze – pump – thaw cycles and placed under argon . After the addition of degassed vinyl acetate ( 1.10 mL , 1.03 g , 12.0 mmol ) , the polymerization was heated at 40 ° C . After 24 h , the final copolymer was purified via repeated precipitations ( three times ) in n - heptane and dried under vacuum overnight at 80 ° C .

A flame - dried 10 mL Schlenk reaction tube , equipped with a stir bar , was charged with 2-Methyl - N - tosylaziridine , Benzoic Acid , DMF , and MTBD in sequence under argon . Then the tube was immersed into a preheated oil bath ( 50 ° C ) . After 60 min the reaction mixture was added slowly to methanol . A white precipitate was collected via centrifugation and dried at 40 ° C under vacuum to give the desired polymer .

P(TsMAz ) ( 50 mg ) in THF ( 5 mL ) was treated with NaOH(aq ) ( 10 wt % , 1.0 mL ) . The mixture was kept under stirring at room temperature for overnight . Ethyl acetate was then added , and the organic phase was separated , washed with water ( 3 × 10 mL ) and saturated NaCl solution ( 3 × 10 mL ) , and dried over Na2SO4 . The concentration of the solution under vacuum and precipitation in methanol afforded a white solid .

1,8-diamino-3,6-dioxaoctane ( 1 mL , 6.67 mmol ) and DMF ( 1 mL ) were added into a round flask equipped with a condenser and with a magnetic stirring bar inside . Carbon disulfide ( 2 mL , 33.3 mmol ) was then injected into the flask . An aqueous solution of NaOH was connected with the condenser in order to absorb the H2S gas . The reaction was stirred at 45 ° C for 5 hours . The solution was precipitated in DMF / methanol three times ( 3 × 50 mL ) , and the precipitate was dried in a vacuum oven at 140 ° C for 12 h , yielding polymer in the form of a yellow glass in a yield of 96 % .

MAA ( 6.50 g , 75.7 mmol ) , CDTPA ( 0.75 g , 1.86 mmol ) , ACPA ( 26 mg , 0.09 mmol ) , 1,3,5-trioxane ( 0.55 g , 6.13 mmol ) , and 1,4-dioxane ( 22 mL ) were introduced in a round - bottom flask . The flask was purged with nitrogen for 30 min , sealed , and immersed in an oil bath at 80 ° C . After 5 h , a sample was collected and a degassed mixture of MMA ( 1.80 g , 18.0 mmol ) and 1,4-dioxane ( 5 mL ) was added . The polymerization was continued for an additional 17 h at 80 ° C , and the product was obtained by precipitating twice in cyclohexane

EFMA ( 0.75 g , 3.0 mmol ) , AIBN ( 9.9 mg , 0.060 mmol ) , and tetralin ( 0.2 mL , internal standard ) were placed in Schlenk tube under argon , and then dissolved in 1,4-dioxane ( 1.6 mL ) . To the solution , methyl acrylate ( 0.27 mL , 3.0 mmol ) was added in this order at room temperature . Immediately after mixing , the reaction solution was warmed to 60˚C. The reaction was terminated 24 h by cooling the solution to – 78˚C.

EFMA ( 0.75 g , 3.0 mmol ) , NSA ( 0.50 g , 3.0 mmol ) , CP - BDT ( 13.3 mg , 0.060 mmol ) , AIBN ( 1.0 mg , 0.006 mmol ) , and anisole ( 0.1 mL , internal standard ) were placed in Schlenk tube under argon , and then dissolved in DMF ( 2 mL ) . The reaction solution was warmed to 60˚C for initiating the radical copolymerization . The reaction was terminated in 24 hours by cooling the solution to – 78˚C. The reaction mixture was purified via dialysis in DMF for removal of residue monomer and DMF was evaporated under reduced pressure to obtain the copolymer ( 1.04 g , Mn = 8200 , Mw / Mn = 1.26 ) .

The copolymer ( 0.40 g ) was placed in Schlenk tube under argon , and then dissolved in DMF ( 10 mL ) . To the solution , isopropyl amine ( 1.0 mL , 10.8 mmol ) was gradually added at 0 ˚C. The reaction solution was warmed to room temperature and stirred for 24 hours . Then , the reaction mixture was purified via dialysis in DMF and DMF was evaporated under reduced pressure to obtain the NIPAM copolymer ( 0.30 g )

The copolymer ( 0.25 g ) was placed in Schlenk tube under argon , and then dissolved in THF ( 5 mL ) . To the solution , TFA ( 1.5 mL , 20 mmol ) was gradually added at 0 ˚C. The reaction solution was warmed to 60 ˚C and stirred for 24 hours . Then , the reaction mixture was evaporated for removal of TFA , followed by dialysis in DMF . Finally , DMF was evaporated under reduced pressure to obtain the product copolymer ( 0.084 g ) .

Monomer ( 60 mg , 10 equiv ) added into a vial in an argon - filled glovebox . G3(1 equiv ) initiator was dissolved in degassed anhydrous THF , and the solution was transferred into a vial containing the monomer ( [ M ] = 100 mM ) . The homogeneous solution was capped , removed from the glovebox , wrapped in aluminum foil , and mixed at room temperature for 5 min . The vial was placed in a preheated aluminum block at 60 ° C and stirred for 24 hr . The polymerization reaction was cooled down to room temperature and quenched with excess ethyl vinyl ether . Purification by precipitation ( MeOH ) to afford the desired polymer .

Dilute solutions of polymer in dichloromethane ( 1 mg / mL ) were degassed with nitrogen and subjected to visible light while stirring vigorously for 48 h. Solvent evaporation by purging with nitrogen was followed by drying under high vacuum to give product polymer as dark brown to black solids in quantitative yield .

In a typical experiment , a 350 mL glass thick - walled pressure vessel was charged with NaBAF , dichloromethane and a magnetic stir bar in the glovebox . The vessel was warmed to 30 oC using an oil bath and allowed to equilibrate for 15 min . The desired amount of palladium precatalyst [ ( 2,6-iPr2-C6H3)N = CMeCMe = N(2,6-iPr2-C6H3)PdMe+ ] in dichloromethane and CH2 = CHCH2CH(OEt)2 was introduced into the polymerization system via syringe under an ethylene atmosphere . The vessel was pressurized and maintained at 4.0 atm of ethylene . After 12 h , the vessel was vented and quenched with 0.2 mL ethanol . The solvent was removed and the polymer was extracted with petroleum ether . The polymer solution was filtered through neutral alumina to remove catalyst residues . The solution was concentrated and the polymer was precipitated by the addition of ethanol . The viscous polymer was subsequently dried in vacuo at 40 oC to a constant weight .

To a solution of acetal - functionalized copolymer ( 100 mg ) in dichloromethane ( 10 mL ) was added trichloroacetic acid ( 500 mg , 3.0 mmol ) and 10 mL H2O. The reaction was stirred for 1 h at room temperature , then quenched with saturated aqueous sodium bicarbonate , and poured into a separatory funnel containing CH2Cl2 ( 20 mL ) . The organic layer was collected and the aqueous layer was extracted with CH2Cl2 ( 30 mL × 3 ) . The organic layers were combined , dried with Na2SO4 , and concentrated under reduced pressure yielding 94 % of aldehyde - functionalized copolymer .

At 0 oC , to a stirred solution of aldehyde - functionalized copolymer ( 100 mg ) in 10 mL anhydrous THF was added LiAlH4 ( 15 mg , 0.4 mmol ) under nitrogen atmosphere . The resulting mixture was stirred at room temperature for another 1 h , then quenched with 2 M HCl . The layers were separated and the aqueous layer was extracted with DCM ( 3 × 10 mL ) . The combined organic layers were combined , dried with Na2SO4 , concentrated to 1 mL and the polymer was precipitated by the addition of methanol yielding 74 % of hydroxy - functionalized copolymer .

To a stirred solution of aldehyde - functionalized copolymer ( 100 mg ) in 10 mL THF containing 2-methyl-2-butene ( 1.40 g , 20 mmol ; 2 M solution in THF ) was treated drop wise with an aqueous solution ( 2 mL ) of sodium chlorite ( 182 mg , 2 mmol ) and monobasic sodium phosphate ( 168 mg , 1.4 mmol ) . The reaction mixture was stirred at room temperature for 2 h before quenched with sat . aq . Na2S2O4 . The layers were separated and the aqueous layer was extracted with DCM ( 3 × 10 mL ) . The combined organic layers were combined , dried with Na2SO4 , concentrated to 1 mL and the polymer was precipitated by the addition of methanol yielding 68 % of carboxyl - functionalized copolymer .

BMA ( 2.08 g , 14.7 mmol ) , MacroRAFT1 ( PBMA25-b - PS15TTC ) ( 0.40 g , 7.3 × 10−2 mmol ) , ACPA ( 4 mg , 1.46 × 10−2 mmol ) , 1,3,5-trioxane ( 0.1 g , 1.23 mmol ) , and 1,4-dioxane ( 9.1 mL ) were introduced in a round - bottom flask . The flask was purged with nitrogen for 30 min , sealed , and immersed in an oil bath at 80 ° C . Samples were periodically withdrawn to calculate monomer conversion by 1H NMR for 20 h.

DMT ( 1 equiv , 0.015 mol , 3.0 g ) and EG ( 1.4 equiv , 0.021 mol , 1.3 g ) were blended in the presence of the DBU / BA catalyst ( 5 mol % with respect to DMT ) at 250 ° C for 1.5 h at atmospheric pressure . Afterward , telechelic poly(1,6 HD ) was added . A mixing time of 1.75 h was used , and after this time was elapsed , vacuum was applied for 4 h. After the polymerization , the copolymers were purified by dissolving them in chloroform ( CHCl3 ) and TFA ( 8:1 , v / v ) mixture , followed by precipitation in excess methanol . Then centrifugation was applied to separate impurities , and then , the products were vacuum - dried .

Styrene ( 2.72 g , 26 mmol ) , RAFT agent ( 0.10 g , 0.26 mmol ) , and AIBN ( 4.3 mg , 0.026 mmol ) were dissolved in anisole ( 1.5 g ) in a 25 mL flask and the solution was degassed four times with freeze – pump – thaw cycling . Then the flask was placed in an oil bath at 80 ° C for 4 h under a nitrogen atmosphere . Finally , the polymerization was quenched in an ice bath . The product was analyzed by SEC and H NMR . Number - average molecular weight was Mn = 3900 and dispersity Đ = 1.06 .

Chromium Amino - bis(phenolate ) Complex ( 0.0138 g , 0.0202 mmol ) and cyclohexene oxide ( 2.00 g , 20.2 mmol ) were mixed in a vial at 22 ° C in a glovebox under N2 . The resulting green solution was stirred magnetically at 22 ° C until hindered by increased viscosity ( 1 h ) . This green viscous material was exposed to air to stop the reaction . The polymer was dissolved in dichloromethane and precipitated using cold 5 % ( v / v with 1 M HCl ) acidified methanol . The resulting white solid was dried in a vacuum oven at 60 ° C overnight .

BPADA ( 17.389 g , 33.409 mmol ) , mPD ( 3.335 g , 30.84 mmol ) , and oDCB ( 80 mL ) were added to a three - neck round - bottom flask equipped with a mechanical stirrer , N2 inlet , and Dean – Stark trap . The slurry was heated at 180 ° C for 12 h under constant stirring and then at 380 ° C for 0.5 h without stirring . The reaction was fully conducted in a constant N2 flow . The resulting PEI - DA was collected , dissolved in CHCl3 , and precipitated into acetone . The precipitate was filtered , washed with acetone , and dried in vacuo at 180 ° C .

Aniline ( 0.48 mL , 5.3 mmol ) and oDCB ( 60 mL ) were added to a three - neck round - bottom flask that contained the PEI - DA . The flask was equipped with a mechanical stirrer , Dean – Stark trap , and N2 inlet with a constant N2 flow . The mixture was heated at 180 ° C for 6 h under constant stirring and then heated at 300 ° C for 0.5 h without stirring . The resulting polymer was dissolved in CHCl3 and precipitated into MeOH . The precipitate was filtered , washed with MeOH , and dried in vacuo at 180 ° C .

GMA ( 30.5 g , 0.19 mol ) , ACVA ( 0.214 g，0.76 mmol ) , CDPA ( 1.538 g，3.80 mmol ) , and trioxane ( 1.714 g，0.019 mol ) were added into a 150 mL round - bottom flask , and then dissolved with anhydrous ethanol ( 45.75 g ) to form a homogeneous solution . The reaction mixture was purged with nitrogen for 1 h , sealed , and then immersed in a pre - heated oil bath ( 70 ° C ) for 2.5 h. The polymerization was quenched by immersion in ice - water and exposure to air . The polymer was precipitated by continuously dropped into the stirred n - hexane ( 400 mL ) and washed several times with additional n - hexane . The obtained product was dried at 45 ° C under vacuum overnight . Mn = 15.3 kg / mol and Mw / Mn = 1.30

MEA ( 1.181 g , 9.08 mmol ) , poly(glycerol monomethacrylate ) ( 16.0 g , 2.27 mmol ) , ACVA ( 0.1272 g，0.45 mmol ) , and trioxane ( 0.082 g，0.91 mmol ) were added into a 150 mL round - bottom flask , and then dissolved with ethanol / water ( 34.51 g/23.01 g , 60/40 , w / w ) . The reaction mixture was purged with nitrogen for 1 h , sealed , and then immersed in a 70 ° C oil bath for 4 h. The polymerization was quenched by immersion in ice - water and exposure to air . The polymer was precipitated by continuously dropped into the stirred n - hexane ( 400 mL ) and washed several times with additional n - hexane . The obtained product was dried at 45 ° C under vacuum overnight . Mn = 16.6 kg / mol and Mw / Mn = 1.35

In a typical experiment , MMA ( 2.0 g ) , PGMA - MEA - CDPA ( 0.1 g ) , DDMAT(5 mg ) and HMPP ( 0.08 g ) were dissolved in an ethanol / water ( 7.2 g/10.8 g ) mixture to form a homogeneous solution . The reaction mixture was purged with nitrogen for 20 min , sealed , and then irradiated with a LED lamp ( 365 nm , 11.5 mW / cm2 ) for 2 h at room temperature . The microspheres were purified by three cycles of centrifugation - redispersion in ethanol / water ( 40/60 , w / w ) and finally dispersed into water .

A solution containing CPDTC ( 240 mg , 0.69 mmol ) , Ane ( 1.04 mL , 6.94 mmol ) , and toluene ( 2.5 mL ) was prepared in a 21 mL glass vial . The glass vial was sealed with a rubber septum , and the reaction solution was degassed with nitrogen for 20 min . The reaction mixture was then placed in the center of oil bath at 70 ° C with stirring and irradiated by blue LED strip light ( λmax = 460 nm , 0.7 mW cm–2 ) . After 24 h irradiation , the reaction solution was dried under vacuum to remove toluene . After drying , the yellow crude product including the excess monomer ( 1.09 g , RAFT conversion ∼76 % )

To a 5 ml glass bottle was added galvinoxyl and ortho - methoxystyrene , then the desired amount of cationic - diimine Pd catalyst in CH2Cl2 was injected . The reaction was stirred for 3 h at 30 ° C in glovebox and then poured into ethanol . Polymer was filtered and dried at 50 ° C for at least 24 h under vacuum .

BMA ( 2.5 g , 17.5 mmol ) , MacroRAFT2 ( PBMA25-b - PS15-TTC ) ( 0.48 g , 8.7 × 10−2 mmol ) , and 0.125 g of HD were mixed to form an organic phase . The aqueous phase was prepared separately by mixing 0.125 g of SDS and 9.5 g of distilled deionized ( DDI ) water . The two phases were mixed in a 25 mL flask and subsequently ultrasonicated using a Branson 450 probe ( maximum output power of 500 W ) at an amplitude of 50 % for 10 min . The KPS ( 0.5 g of 0.24 g L−1 stock solution in water , 4.44 × 10−3 mmol ) was then added and the flask was purged with nitrogen for 30 min , sealed , and immersed in an oil bath at 80 ° C . Samples were periodically withdrawn to calculate monomer conversion by 1H NMR for 30 min .

To a 150 mL glass pressure reactor connected with a high pressure gas line was added 23 mL of toluene , BHT and para - methoxystyrene , then adjusted to the desired polymerization temperature ( 30 oC ) . The desired amount of phosphine - sulfonate Pd catalyst in CH2Cl2 was injected into the polymerization system via syringe under N2 . With a rapid stirring , the reactor was pressurized and maintained at 6 atm of ethylene . After 3 h , the pressure reactor was vented and the polymer was precipitated in ethanol , filtered and dried at 50 ° C for at least 24 h under vacuum .

A 2-necked round - bottom flask equipped with rubber septum and stopcock was loaded with the respective 2-isopropyl-2-oxazoline ( 10 g ) and acetonitrile ( 20 mL ) . The mixture was degassed by three consecutive freeze - pump - thaw cycles , backfilled with nitrogen and set to 80 ° C . A separate flask was filled with methyl trifluoromethanesulfonate and acetonitrile ( 100 mg / mL ) and bubbled with nitrogen . A pre - determined amount of this solution was added to the monomer solution using a nitrogen purged needle . The reaction was terminated with liquid nitrogen and allowed to reach room temperature again . The flask was opened under argon flow and NaN3 ( 10 equivalents compared to the initiator ) was added . The flask was sealed again and the mixture stirred at 40 ° C for 24 h. The polymers were isolated and recovered as white powders by dialysis against water and subsequent freeze - drying .

The step - growth polymerization was conducted by addind imidazole ( 7.04 g ) with 1,5-dibromo-3-methylpentane ( 25.2 g ) in DMSO ( 34.0 mL ) at 80 ° C under a nitrogen atmosphere . Two molar equivalents of NaHCO3 ( 8.69 g ) were added to promote the polymerization . After 1 day of polymerization , the obtained precipitate was dialyzed in a mixture of methanol and water ( 1:1 in volume percent ) for 3 days using a dialysis tube . The resultant solution was dried via freeze - drying , under vacuum conditions at room temperature for 6 h. Next , approximately 10 mL of water was added into the solid sample . The flask was then connected to a custom - made vacuum line and freeze - dried at room temperature for 15 h. Backbone PILs with bromides as counter anions ( B - Br , 2.08 g ) were obtained in powder form .

( 1-bromoethyl)benzene ( 88 μL , 0.65 mmol ) , styrene ( 11.2 mL , 0.10 mol ) , PMDETA ( 13.5 μL , 0.06 mmol ) , and anisole ( 6 mL ) were added to a reaction flask . The mixture was degassed by three cycles of freeze – pump – thaw . In a glovebox , copper(I ) bromide ( 4.7 mg , 0.03 mmol ) was added , and the mixture was allowed to stir for 10 min before being placed in an oil bath at 100 ° C . After 7 h , the flask was rapidly cooled , and the solution was run over a neutral alumina column to remove the copper catalyst . The polymer solution was reduced by rotary evaporation , and the polymer was subsequently precipitated in methanol ( three times ) and dried overnight under vacuum at room temperature . PS was isolated as a white solid ( yield = 0.80 g ) .

Polystyrene ( 2400 g / mol , 0.200 g , 0.08 mmol ) , solketal acrylate ( 1.11 mL , 6.4 mmol ) , PMDETA ( 1.7 μL , 8.3 μmol ) , and anisole ( 0.6 mL ) were mixed in a reaction flask . The mixture was degassed by three cycles of freeze – pump – thaw . In a glovebox , copper(I ) bromide ( 1.2 mg , 8.3 μmol ) was added , and the mixture was allowed to stir for 10 min before being placed in an oil bath at 90 ° C . After 3.75 h , the flask was rapidly cooled in an acetone / dry ice bath , and the solution was run over a neutral alumina column to remove the copper catalyst . The polymer solution was subsequently precipitated in cold ( −78 ° C ) pentane ( three times ) and dried overnight under vacuum at room temperature . PS - b - PSA was isolated as a white solid ( yield = 0.15 g ) .

PS - b - PSA copolymers were dissolved in 1,4-dioxane ( 3 wt % ) followed by the slow addition of a 1 N HCl solution to the stirred polymer solution using a syringe ( 10 vol % of 1 N HCl ) . Purging with dry nitrogen gas , the hydrolysis reaction was performed at room temperature for 18 h. The system was then heated to 90 ° C for 72 h. Then , the converted copolymer was isolated by freezing the solution in liquid nitrogen and then drying it for 24 h at room temperature under vacuum . PS - b - PAA copolymer was rinsed with a 0.1 N HCl solution 3 times . Afterward , the copolymer was washed with DI water three times and dried under vacuum again .

PPG - DTC2 ( 1.00 g ) , and 2,2′-(Ethylenedioxy)bis(ethylamine ) ( 0.180 g ) were charged in an aluminum cup . The resulting mixture was rapidly stirred manually using a wooden spatula ( 1 min ) at 23 ° C to get a homogenous mixture . The reaction proceeded for 2.5 h. All resulting polymers were isolated as yellow films .

Lithium benzylthiolate solution was diluted with 1 mL dry cyclohexane in a 5 mL oven - dried round bottom flask before TBDPS ketene was introduced dropwise . The mixture was kept stirring under ambient temperature for 90 minutes . Then , the mixture was neutralized with acetic acid and the solvent was removed under vacuum . The residue was loaded on a column and eluted with Hex : EA=20:1 . The collected polymer sample was diluted with MeOH and heated to reflux for 5min . Then hot filtration led to the isolation of the oligomer as a solid , with the mass recovery of 0.07 g ( 50 % ) .

A 20 mL glass vial equipped with a stirring bar was charged with MMA ( 1.0 mL , 9.29 mmol ) and CPADB ( 0.046 mmol ) , and anhydrous DMSO ( 1 mL ) as the solvent , inside a glove box , for the polymerization . Afterwards , the vial was capped with a rubber septum and sealed with parafilm , and bubbled with argon for 30 min outside the glove box . Subsequently , the polymerization was carried out under a 3 W 455 nm LED irradiation at room temperature . After 18 h , the sample was dried under reduced pressure .

Into a 10 mL dried Schlenk tube equipped with magnetic stirrer was placed with 4,4'-((hexane-1,6-diylbis(oxy))bis(4,1-phenylene))bis(2-methylbut-3-yn-2-ol ) ( 43.5 mg , 0.1 mmol ) , 1,4-diiodobenzene ( 33.0 mg , 0.1 mmol ) , Pd(OAc)2 ( 2.3 mg , 0.01 mmol ) , LiOtBu ( 48 mg , 0.6 mmol ) under CO2 ( balloon ) . Dried DMF ( 1 mL ) were injected into the tube by a syringe . The resulting mixture was stirred at 80 oC under atmospheric CO2 for 4 h. After cooled to room temperature , 4 mL of DCM was added to dilute the mixture . Then the solution was added dropwise into 200 mL of methanol via a cotton filter under stirring . The precipitate was allowed to stand overnight and then collected by filtration . The polymer was washed with methanol and dried under vacuum at room temperature to a constant weight . A yellow solid of polymer was obtained in 92 % yield .
